location: Tong'an Street, Da'an District - 71m from Xinyi-Anhe MRT station, near Tonghua night market
notes: Fully furnished 1+1 room apartment in 13-year-old elevator building with 24-hour management. Convenient location near MRT and amenities. Pets allowed and cooking permitted with natural gas. Unable to assess baby safety features (balcony railings, sharp corners) or actual condition without photos. The listing appears legitimate with full amenities but visual inspection recommended for a family with an infant.
